text:
Visit the Supreme Court of India's official website for case status : https://www.sci.gov.in/case-status-case-no/ 
Select the 'Case number' option 
Select the desired case type from dropdown menu. 
Ensure and enter the correct case number in the respective field. 
Select case year and fill out the captcha. 
Press 'Search' and you will get desired case status and information.

metadata.category: Steps to know the case status of Supreme Court of India
metadata.title: case status of supreme court in india
